ygData.subject: Re: LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
ygData.msgSnippet: I see your point, perhaps we should all petition as they did to get their bows and try to get us shadowknights revamped.
ygData.messageBody:
I see your point, perhaps we should all petition as they did to get their
bows and try to get us shadowknights revamped.


>From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
>Date: Mon, 28 Jun 1999 03:30:46 -0600
>
>From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>
>Damon:
>
>What you have said is true if Paladins did not get Flash of Light. When the
>SK is blinded, he/she cannot shoot, hit or cast. And yes, Paladins can use
>bows now. Combine that with Flash of Light and Blind, the Shadow Knight can
>hardly fight back.
>
>
